column1: Table 6.4: Salient features of tanks in MWS-021-1

column2: A tank had been there but silted and abandoned.
column3: It is necessary to rehabilitate the tank, and the bund height needs to be increased by 0.5 m. Desilting of the tank is needed.

column2: Proposed to construct an earthen bund with a toe wall at the upstream face.
